p: Concerning DENV, Warke and colleagues performed a gene expression study on infected myoblasts, and identified genes potentially involved in the immune control of infection [ 99]. They observed an upregulation of genes involved in IFN antiviral response and others (e.g., IFN response factor 7 (IRF-7), melanoma-derived antigen 5 (MDA-5, â€¦)), although the exact mechanisms of the immunopathogenesis are still not clear [ 99].
